document_data.title: Dungeons & Dragons Starter Set (2022)
document_data.author: [[Wizards RPG Team]]
document_data.edition1: <!-- leave blank if there is only one -->
document_data.mainbody:
The '''''Dungeons & Dragons Starter Set''''' is a boxed set for the 5{{th}} edition of ''[[Dungeons & Dragons]]''. Intended to serve as a basic introduction to tabletop ''D&D'', it contains a set of basic rules, an adventure, several pre-made character sheets, and a set of dice. The adventure is ''[[Dungeons & Dragons Starter Set (2022)/Dragons of Stormwreck Isle|Dragons of Stormwreck Isle]]'', an introductory adventure module for 1â€“5 player-characters taking them from 1{{st}} level to 3{{rd}} as they explore a mysterious new island. {{quote|'''''Everything you need to start playing the world's greatest roleplaying game.'''''

The ''Dungeons & Dragons Starter Set: Dragons of Stormwreck Isle'' is your gateway to action-packed adventures in the cooperative storytelling game Dungeons & Dragons, where heroes battle monsters, find treasure, and undertake epic quests. This box contains the essential rules of the game plus everything you need to play heroic characters caught up in an ancient war among dragons as they explore the secrets of Stormwreck Isle.}}
document_data.Contents:
* ''Starter Set Rulebook'', a 32-page booklet containing a basic set of rules for adventurers levels 1–3.
* ''[[Dragons of Stormwreck Isle]]'', a 48-page adventure booklet
* 5 pregenerated character sheets
* 6 game dice
